TopicTitle: Platform Enigma- an off topic chat thread.

Articles.Content: After a while we'd also be unable to return to earth because we would've adjusted to the new gravity via our bones and muscle wasting away. The G-forces upon entering Earth would kill us.
I notice that we haven't had a chobbit encounter in a long time on this thread....I have a feeling that may just happen.

If you want to unleash the fury of Chobit. all you have to say is something negative about the Axis powers

*hides in bunker*

*gets in buker with you*

pass me my loud speaker.The Axis lost at the maker fair when trying to destroy cargo ships before 12 miniutes.(The cargo ship captains were inexperienced people)So you can say the had a bad aim.
We should make a thread on living on Mars. Where we live on Mars. And there is a plot similar to the movie "Moon." Moon was a great sci-fi movie.

*gets in buker with you*

pass me my loud speaker.The Axis lost at the maker fair when trying to destroy cargo ships before 12 miniutes.(The cargo ship captains were inexperienced people)So you can say the had a bad aim.

*digs out and seals exit*
lets take this thread to orbit shall we?
Okay! Space station Enigma launch in T- 10, 9, 8......

Okay! Space station enigma launch in T- 10, 9, 8......

*pushes ShachinianX out of the way and interfaces with the controls*

765Go!

*Launch*
Space station Enigma has launched! Destination: PLUTO ORBIT!

I notice that we haven't had a chobbit encounter in a long time on this thread....I have a feeling that may just happen.

This thread's velocity is too high, and we don't really have enough dV left to slow it down for a Chobit encounter. Although the planetary alignment later tonight will slow it down enough for that to happen.

Rage097 and ShaconianX, please stop spamming up this thread with roleplaying. Officially roleplaying is discouraged here, if you want to do that you should find another site that specializes in it.
Space station Enigma Pluto encounter in T- 8 years.....
Oh? I'm going to have visitors? *starts to tiddy up the Izumo Expedition base* Pardon my laundry, I wasn't expecting anyone ever... ^.^;;;

Yay.*gets on Ships coms*

This is your captian speaking if you look out to the right docking port you be able to see Chobit in less than 1 hr.

*sees rage floating by*

I forgot to tell you we were on a ship rage sorry :s

Edit: Chobit can you use a tractor bean to slow us down to land so we can visit you,not to mention to help get rage who is floating off.

Indeed so. hope you won't mind the anti-axis person *cough*MGUARN*cough*

*poof, gone*
Suddenly, a wild Omega Seal appears!

Well rage you be suprise that i'm also a Anti Anti-axis person too so i don't care about both sides ,but rather be Leading an Imperial army of steam rage bots under the flag of the North Light Republic.Also random thought...A true true friend.

Topic: How hig-...wait *flips through papers* already did that...

Okay: What's up with the hate on music such as electronica?
because I rather be a discord ,and be a screwball then sing daddy discord.Oh the wonderful chaos.we can restore all of earth back to it's Chaos state.
I am so confused...

I am so confused...

*throws hands up* I'm done. I have no clue what's going on.
Oh the utter Chaos seems to be spreading onto this thread *sits in chair drinks chocolate milk from cotton candy clouds that rain chocolate rain.* *throws in away* *boom!*

Oh the utter Chaos seems to be spreading onto this thread *sits in chair drinks chocolate milk from cotton candy clouds that rain chocolate rain.* *throws in away* *boom!*

LOOK OUT. HERE COMES TOM!

Yay.*gets on Ships coms*

This is your captian speaking if you look out to the right docking port you be able to see Chobit in less than 1 hr.

*sees rage floating by*

I forgot to tell you we were on a ship rage sorry :s

Edit: Chobit can you use a tractor bean to slow us down to land so we can visit you,not to mention to help get rage who is floating off.

Tractor beam?! LAAAAAAAAME!!! *fires a grappling rocket-anchor into the ship and jumps overboard to grab Rage*
Well thats great chobbit did you mind to bring space suits since we only have one ,and a half since well....someone was cooking stew with it *Looks at discord kerman*
*taps her helmet* Valhallans are ALWAYS prepared!
